00032 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00033   CommandShellPtr shell;
00034   CommandInterpreterPtr interp;
00035   Client *hypertable;
00036 
00037   try {
00038     CommandShell::add_options(Config::description(argv[0]));
00039     Config::init_with_comm(argc, argv);
00040 
00041     hypertable = new Hypertable::Client(System::install_dir, Config::cfgfile);
00042 
00043     interp = hypertable->create_hql_interpreter();
00044 
00045     shell = new CommandShell("hypertable", interp, Config::varmap);
00046     interp->set_silent(shell->silent());
00047     interp->set_test_mode(shell->test_mode());
00048 
00049     return shell->run();
00050   }
00051   catch(Exception &e) {
00052     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00053   }
00054   catch(exception& e) {
00055     HT_ERROR_OUT << e.what() << HT_END;
00056   }
00057 
00058   return 1;
00059 }
